articles.author: Jenna Lemoncelli
articles.title: New rumors of Shedeur Sanders’ ‘unprofessional’ NFL combine behavior emerge - New York Post
articles.description: All eyes were on Colorado quarterback Shedeur Sanders at the 2025 NFL Scouting Combine in Indianapolis last week.
articles.content:
A new account has emerged of the impression Shedeur Sanders left on some NFL teams at the scouting combine last week.
The potential top-three pick in this year’s draft, who is the son of legendary f… [+3518 chars]
